    Refresh Live Website

Project Description

Refresh Website

Being able to illustrate a look and feel for a brand are really important elements in it's design. Additionally, promoting your service or program through a website allows you to expand your reach to a wider range of potential costumers.

Refresh is an hypothetical online program that helps people set daily calorie budget, to be able to track their food and exercises and to stay motivated to lose weight or maintain a healthy weight in a safe and reliable way.

Research and Development

There has been a massive increase in the number of programs provided to individuals to help track and manage a more healthy lifestyle. Many websites are popping up in order to attract those potential customers. While doing research on this topic it was really interesting to take note of the UI trends that many of these websites used and how these trends should be incorporated in the design of the website to make it more user friendly. Additionally, using the UI trends it was clear how the website should be laid out and how the design should create easy flow for the user.
